name: everyday beanie chunky
sizes_available: newborn, baby, toddler, child, small adult, large adult
notes:
everyday beanie chunky
a free ribbed hat pattern featuring cozy 1x1 ribbing and bold, stylish texture. this chunky-weight beanie is a quick, beginner-friendly knit that’s perfect for keeping warm on chilly days. the hat is worked in the round with simple crown decreases that form a satisfying “x” at the top.

pattern details:

yarn: premier [anti-pilling bamboo chunky (affiliate link)][1] or any chunky-weight yarn
needles: [us 10 (6.5 mm) circular & dpn (affiliate link)][2]
notions: [yarn needle (affiliate link)][3]
sizes: one size fits most adults (adjustable due to stretchy ribbing)
gauge: 14 stitches and 20 rows = 4 inches in 1x1 rib, unstretched
features:

quick to knit with chunky yarn
classic 1x1 ribbing for a snug, comfortable fit
stylish “x” crown decreases
additional notes:
this pattern pairs perfectly with the everyday beanie family, including the [everyday beanie worsted][4] and [newborn everyday beanie][5].

pattern availability:
this is a free knitting pattern available on my website. [click here to access it][6].

share your projects:
tag @knitinthewomb to share your finished hats on instagram with #everydaybeaniechunky . i can’t wait to see your creations!
